wiki.content:
"In My Bed" is a song by English recording artist Amy Winehouse from her debut album, Frank (2003). It was released on 5 April 2004 as the album's third single (double A-sided with "You Sent Me Flying"), reaching number sixty on the UK Singles Chart.
  
 "In My Bed" uses almost the same beat as rapper Nas's 2003 hit single "Made You Look" (which in turn contains a sample of the Incredible Bongo Band's 1973 cover of "Apache"). Both songs were produced by Salaam Remi.
 
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary:
"In My Bed" is a song by English recording artist Amy Winehouse from her debut album, Frank (2003). It was released on 5 April 2004 as the album's third single (double A-sided with "You Sent Me Flying"), reaching number sixty on the UK Singles Chart.
  
 "In My Bed" uses almost the same beat as rapper Nas's 2003 hit single "Made You Look" (which in turn contains a sample of the Incredible Bongo Band's 1973 cover of "Apache"). Both songs were produced by Salaam Remi.

track.name: In My Bed
comments: Notwithstanding the amazing vocals, the best production on Frank
the scatting near the end is absolutely delicious
in the niiight in the niiiiiiiiiiight
Beautiful tune.  Wow, she's really wailing near the end - she does it so rarely that it's super effective!  Wish others thought the same way.  :-)
makes me wanna drink some wine
so fucking good. miss you, amy. [5] masterpiece [5]
one of the greatest tracks. ever. [2]
one of the greatest tracks. ever.
U can never RIP....U are immortal..... [2]
